name: NTU-PKU Double Masters in Finance
title: NTU-PKU Double Master's
description:
The NTU-PKU Double Master’s programme is a unique and enriching educational experience jointly offered by two globally renowned institutions, Nanyang Technological University (NTU), Singapore, and Peking University (PKU), China. Established in 2018, this full-time programme is designed to cultivate the next generation of globally minded, bilingual professionals equipped with advanced expertise in finance and related fields.
Students will complete all courses required by the
NTU Master of Science in Finance programme
and complete one of the four specialised master's degree programmes in Finance, Insurance, Tax or International Business at the School of Economics, PKU (SEPKU).
Graduates will be awarded NTU's MSc Finance degree and a PKU's professional master's degree upon completing this Double Master's programme.
The double master's degree will be delivered in two stages at both universities.
1
In the first year, students study at NTU, students are expected to complete all courses mandated by MSc Finance programme. In the subsequent years, they transition to PKU to fulfil the requirements of one of four professional master's degrees in Finance, Insurance, Tax or International Business. As part of their learning experience, participants are also expected to complete at least a 3 months internship at PKU.
Learn More About the Curriculum
1
Applicants with Chinese passports must first be admitted to SEPKU.
Admission Requirements
A good bachelor’s degree in any discipline
A good GMAT or GRE score*
Language proficiency in English and Chinese
Good IELTS or TOEFL score if your degree was not taught exclusively in English
Chinese Proficiency Test (HSK) L6 score 210 if your degree was not taught exclusively in Chinese
Applicants with no work experience are welcome to apply
All shortlisted applicants will be invited for NTU and PKU admission interviews.
